utils

Class StatKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.StatKeeper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<StatKeeper>

    public class StatKeeper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<StatKeeper>
    A class representing a collection of statistic data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatKeeper

        public StatKeeper()

      • StatKeeper

        public StatKeeper(boolean recordValues,
          java.lang.String statName,
          java.lang.String valuename)
        Creates a new StatKeeper object.
        Parameters:
        recordValues - defines if values should be recorded, otherwise just a statistic of min, max, mean, sdev is kept
        statName - gives the value a name which is used for labeling the columns in the exported csv
        isDisplayed - if true, this stat is added to a list of notable stats which can be exported to a csv together

      • saveRboxFile

        public static void saveRboxFile(java.lang.String filename,
                java.util.ArrayList<StatKeeper> statList,
                int step)
        Creates a text file in a format to be read by the statistical program R the stat with the generation count is omitted
        Parameters:
        filename - filename and path of the file to be created
        statList - an ArrayList of statkeeper objects
        step - only every step-th generation is saved, this is useful to keep a comprehensible boxplot

      • showValuation

        public static void showValuation()
        Calculates the valuation of a simulation (which may consist of more than one run) and outputs it on the console.
